nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member sedimentTransport is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Time stamp for frequency of computation of the sedimentTransport analysis member.

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of stream the sedimentTransport analysis member should be tied to

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_directory
nml_option.description: subdirectory to write text files (might useful)

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_grain_size
nml_option.description: dimaeter of a spherical sediment particle

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_drag_coefficient
nml_option.description: drag coefficient used for bottom shear stress computation

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_erate
nml_option.description: bed surface erosion rate

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_tau_ce
nml_option.description: critical shear for erosion

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_tau_cd
nml_option.description: critical shear for deposition

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_grain_porosity
nml_option.description: sediment porosity

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_water_density
nml_option.description: water density

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_grain_density
nml_option.description: sediment density

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_alpha
nml_option.description: A parameter related to the sediment property, with typical values of O(1e-4~1e-3)

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_kinematic_viscosity
nml_option.description: kinematic viscosity of the fluild

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_vertical_diffusion_coefficient
nml_option.description: vertical diffsuion coefficient

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_bedload
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if bedload transport is to be computed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_suspended
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if suspended transport is to be computed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_sedimentTransport_use_lat_lon_coords
nml_option.description: If true, latitude/longitude coordinates are output for eddy census. Otherwise x/y/z coordinates are used. Ignored if not on a sphere.

package.name: sedimentTransportAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the sediment flux index analysis member.

var.name: sedimentFallVelocity
var.description: Sediment settling velocity in the water column
